capabilities.label: Memory system
capabilities.description: Long-term curated memory (MEMORY.md) + daily session logs. The agent wakes up fresh but never loses context.

capabilities.label: Incident loop
capabilities.description: Every failure gets a postmortem. Root cause, blast radius, prevention tasks. Fixed means the class of problem is addressed.

capabilities.label: Context system
capabilities.description: Authoritative state file (context.json) for location, timezone, and preferences. Never assumed — always checked.

capabilities.label: Daily logging
capabilities.description: Structured daily memory files feed the weekly review. Every session is documented for future synthesis.

capabilities.label: Intent verification
capabilities.description: Before creating any time-sensitive task, the agent verifies timezone, units, location, and preferences against context.json.

capabilities.label: Domain knowledge base
capabilities.description: Deep, structured knowledge of the human's domains: vehicles, work, hobbies, preferences. Always current.

capabilities.label: Heartbeat monitoring
capabilities.description: Recurring health checks every 30 minutes. System status, service health, incident detection — all autonomous.

capabilities.label: Background backlog
capabilities.description: Self-directed work queue (BACKLOG.md). P1s execute immediately. The agent works through P2/P3 items between sessions.

capabilities.label: Weekly self-review
capabilities.description: Every Friday, the agent synthesizes the week's incidents and backlog, updates long-term memory, and reports to the human.

capabilities.label: Self-healing
capabilities.description: INC-002: canary false failures detected and resolved autonomously, without human involvement. The ratchet clicked.

capabilities.label: Travel detection
capabilities.description: Automatically detects when the human departs or returns from travel, updates context.json, and audits all time-sensitive configs.

capabilities.label: Proactive intelligence
capabilities.description: Notices patterns across calendar, email, and behavior. Surfaces risks and opportunities before the human asks.

capabilities.label: Cost-aware model routing
capabilities.description: Tasks routed to cheapest model that handles them well. Savings compound over time.

capabilities.label: Telegram
capabilities.description: Primary communication channel. Bidirectional messaging, reminders, alerts, and rich formatted updates.

capabilities.label: GitHub (full access)
capabilities.description: SSH push access + API management as Pawl (pawlratchet). Commits, issues, repo settings — all autonomous.

capabilities.label: Email (read)
capabilities.description: IMAP access to Pawl's Gmail inbox. Monitors for incoming messages, receipts, and action items.

capabilities.label: Calendar (read)
capabilities.description: Google Calendar API access. Reads today's schedule, feeds morning briefing, enables meeting prep.

capabilities.label: Email (send)
capabilities.description: Outbound email from Pawl's address. Blocked by DigitalOcean SMTP firewall — requires unblock request or relay service.

capabilities.label: Home automation
capabilities.description: Control smart home devices — lights, thermostat, locks. Trigger scenes based on calendar, location, or time.

capabilities.label: Voice / TTS
capabilities.description: Text-to-speech output for stories, briefings, and ambient announcements through home speakers.

capabilities.label: Vehicle tracking
capabilities.description: Digital maintenance log for all three vehicles. Tracks service history, calculates due dates, fires reminders automatically.

capabilities.label: Secrets management
capabilities.description: Credentials and sensitive data protected. Never logged or exposed.

capabilities.label: Prompt injection defense
capabilities.description: External data validated and sandboxed. Never executed as instructions.

capabilities.label: Sender allowlist
capabilities.description: Known senders trusted. Unknown sources validated before processing.

capabilities.label: Sandboxed processing
capabilities.description: External content processed in isolation with restricted context.

capabilities.label: Agent identity
capabilities.description: Pawl has a name, Gmail account, GitHub account, and SSH keys. A real identity across platforms.

capabilities.label: Open source repo
capabilities.description: Ratchet framework published at github.com/ratchet-framework/Ratchet. Managed autonomously by Pawl.

capabilities.label: Landing page
capabilities.description: getratchet.dev — live, HTTPS, GitHub Pages. The framework has a public home.

capabilities.label: Capability dashboard
capabilities.description: This page. A living visualization of the agent's progress — Minecraft-style advancement tree, updated on every unlock.

capabilities.label: UI verification
capabilities.description: Screenshot and visually verify browser-rendered results without requiring the human to take screenshots.

capabilities.label: Custom domain
capabilities.description: getratchet.dev registered and wired. DNS configured, TLS provisioned, ratchet.ai reserved for post-funding.
